The First Years - Carry-Me-Near 5-in-1 Bassinet Found by crr3143 More from: walmart.com The 5-in-1 sleep system is a portable sleeper, bassinet, bedside sleeper, play seat and changing table all in one. * The three sleep modes: portable sleeper, bassinet and bedside sleeper * The ergonomically designed handle... See more» The 5-in-1 sleep system is a portable sleeper, bassinet, bedside sleeper, play seat and changing table all in one. * The three sleep modes: portable sleeper, bassinet and bedside sleeper * The ergonomically designed handle allows you to carry your sleeping baby from room to room in the portable sleeper * The controls are built directly into the handle; battery-operated gentle vibrations, five peaceful audio selections and a nightlight * The full-sized bassinet that features a sturdy base that can rock back and forth or lock into place * Easily convert the bassinet into a bedside sleeper that securely attaches to the adult bed * Vinyl covered changing table offers a separate surface from the sleep area * The portable sleeper becomes a play seat complete with fun plush characters that dangle from the canopy See less» Pin It Tweet
